solution_line_template: Polly stands on her back legs for {polly_multiplier}*{pulsar_time}=<<{polly_multiplier}*{pulsar_time}={polly_time}>>{polly_time} minutes
Petra stands on his back legs for {polly_time}/{petra_divisor}=<<{polly_time}/{petra_divisor}={petra_time}>>{petra_time} minutes.
In total, the three entertainers stand on their back legs for {pulsar_time}+{polly_time}+{petra_time}=<<{pulsar_time}+{polly_time}+{petra_time}={total_time}>>{total_time} minutes'
